title: Silent Alternates
content:
Hello!  
This is to let you know of my second font release called Silent Alternates.

Silent Alternates born from the deconstruction of Silent Light, resulting in a most impressive typeface.  
Ideal for use in large sizes, such as posters, titles and is an alternative to italics. It can be used to highlight some words in conjunction with Silent Light.

Hope you like it.

[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/danieljusti/silent-alternates/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819032946/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/danieljusti/silent-alternates/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/danieljusti/silent-alternates/")

Thanks for your time. Feedback’s apreciated.  
Best regards!

Justi
